english.segment1: You decided long ago. To let me into your deepest soul. You have given me a private place. Then somehow you let it fade away. I know you so well, and I can tell. When you've been hiding something from me. Just let it go, let my love flow;. Let it bring you release.
english.segment2: I have come to breathe new life. Into the heart of a child of mine. I have come to give you peace. So lift your head and believe.
english.segment3: You were made in a beautiful way;. Born to be holy and sure of your faith. Something inside you has led you astray. Now you're locked in a struggle, And it won't go away. I know you have been down on your knees. I saw you cryin' for mercy. Well, how can I help when you're still holdin' on. To somethin' more precious than me?
